settings.heading: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.content: We accept all major credit cards, Paypal, Klarna, Apple Pay, Google Pay and Shop Pay.

settings.heading: Can I order over the phone?
settings.content:
Yes. Please email us at support@vicereversa.co.uk and request a call back with your
phone number and best time to contact you.

settings.heading: Where are Vice Reversa products shipped from?
settings.content:
Vice Reversa products are shipped via Royal Mail from our distribution
centre in the UK.

settings.heading: How long are shipping times?
settings.content:
All products will be dispatched within four working days of you placing
your order. Our standard shipping is 48H tracked post via Royal Mail. We also offer next day shipping with DHL.

settings.heading: Do you ship internationally?
settings.content:
Yes. For European orders please visit vicereversaskin.eu

For Australia and New Zealand please visit vicereversaskin.com.au

settings.heading: There’s a problem with my order. How do I get in touch?
settings.content: No problem - drop us an email to our customer service team at support@vicereversa.co.uk with your order number and problem.

settings.heading: Can I cancel or change my order after it’s been placed?
settings.content: Orders can be cancelled as long as they have not been fulfilled and shipped out yet. If you need to make a change to your order, please don’t hesitate to reach out to our customer service team at support@vicereversa.co.uk.

settings.heading: Are Vice Reversa products organic or all-natural?
settings.content:
Vice Reversa is not focused on organic or all-natural formulae. We’re focused on results and finding the best ingredients for clear and smooth skin.

Some of our ingredients are made in labs, but we like to use high concentrations of natural ingredients wherever we can. Our patches are formulated through high-tech engineering utilising a unique delivery system to allow these ingredients to have better efficacy in the inner layers.

Our products are free from potentially harmful ingredients such as parabens, phalates, sulphates, fragrance, preservatives and mineral oil.

settings.heading: Are the products cruelty free?
settings.content: Yes, all of our products are cruelty free.

settings.heading: Are your products Vegan?
settings.content: Yes, all of our products are fully Vegan and contain no animal sources.

settings.heading: Is your packaging recyclable?
settings.content: Yes! Our box, film and tray are widely recycled. The foil sachets are not yet recyclable.

settings.heading: Do you make patches for other areas?
settings.content: We love developing and perfecting new products, so stay tuned for more releases. Click here to subscribe to stay up to date.

settings.heading: What is the expiration date on Vice Reversa products?
settings.content:
Please check the ‘Period After Opening’ symbol on the packaging.

The symbol looks like an open jar with a month to indicate how long the product should remain stable for after opening.

settings.heading: Where are Vice Reversa patches made?
settings.content: Vice Reversa patches are developed and manufactured in South Korea.

settings.heading: What’s the best way to store my patches?
settings.content: Store at room temperature away from direct sunlight. It’s best to keep patches away from moisture.

settings.heading: How do I cancel my Subscription?
settings.content:
Log in to your account here, where you will be able to amend your
subscription details.
